verses.verse: And when any <WH5315> will offer <WH7126> a meat offering <WH7133> to the LORD, <WH3068> his offering <WH7133> shall be of fine flour; <WH5560> and he shall pour <WH3332> oil <WH8081> on it, and put <WH5414> frankincense <WH3828> thereon: <WH5921>

And he shall bring <WH935> it to Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> the priests: <WH3548> and he shall take <WH7061> out of there <WH8033> his handful <WH4393> <WH7062> of the flour <WH5560> thereof, and of the oil <WH8081> thereof, with all <WH3605> the frankincense <WH3828> thereof; and the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the memorial <WH234> of it on the altar, <WH4196> to be an offering made by fire, of a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> to the LORD: <WH3068>
And the remnant <WH3498> of the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aaron's <WH175> and his sons': <WH1121> it is a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> of the offerings of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire.

And if <WH518> you bring <WH7126> an oblation <WH7133> of a meat offering <WH4503> baked <WH644> in the oven, <WH8574> it shall be unleavened <WH4682> cakes <WH2471> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> or unleavened <WH4682> wafers <WH7550> anointed <WH4886> with oil. <WH8081>
And if <WH518> your oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baked in a pan, <WH4227> it shall be of fine flour <WH5560> unleavened, <WH4682> mingled <WH1101> with oil. <WH8081>
You shall part <WH6626> it in pieces, <WH6595> and pour <WH3332> oil <WH8081> thereon: <WH5921> it is a meat offering. <WH4503>
And if <WH518> your oblation <WH7133> be a meat offering <WH4503> baked in the frying pan, <WH4802> it shall be made <WH6213> of fine flour <WH5560> with oil. <WH8081>

And you shall bring <WH935> the meat offering <WH4503> that is made <WH6213> of these <WH428> things to the LORD: <WH3068> and when it is presented <WH7126> to the priest, <WH3548> he shall bring <WH5066> it to the altar. <WH4196>

And the priest <WH3548> shall take <WH7311> from the meat offering <WH4503> a memorial <WH234> thereof, and shall burn <WH6999> it on the altar: <WH4196> it is an offering made by fire, of a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> to the LORD. <WH3068>

And that which is left <WH3498> of the meat offering <WH4503> shall be Aaron's <WH175> and his sons': <WH1121> it is a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> of the offerings of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire.

No <WH3808> meat offering, <WH4503> which <WH834> you shall bring <WH7126> to the LORD, <WH3068> shall be made <WH6213> with leaven: <WH2557> for you shall burn <WH6999> no <WH3808> leaven, <WH7603> nor any <WH3605> honey, <WH1706> in any offering of the LORD <WH3068> made by fire.

As for the oblation <WH7133> of the first fruits, <WH7225> you shall offer <WH7126> them to the LORD: <WH3068> but they shall not be burnt <WH5927> on <WH413> the altar <WH4196> for a sweet <WH5207> smell. <WH7381>

And every <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> of your meat offering <WH4503> shall you season <WH4414> with salt; <WH4417> neither <WH3808> shall you suffer the salt <WH4417> of the covenant <WH1285> of your God <WH430> to be lacking <WH7673> from your meat offering: <WH4503> with all <WH3605> your offerings <WH7133> you shall offer <WH7126> salt. <WH4417>

And if <WH518> you offer <WH7126> a meat offering <WH4503> of your first fruits <WH1061> to the LORD, <WH3068> you shall offer <WH7126> for the meat offering <WH4503> of your first fruits <WH1061> green ears <WH24> of corn dried <WH7033> by the fire, <WH784> even corn <WH1643> beaten <WH1643> out of full <WH3759> ears. <WH3759>
And you shall put <WH5414> oil <WH8081> on it, and lay <WH7760> frankincense <WH3828> thereon: <WH5921> it is a meat offering. <WH4503>

And the priest <WH3548> shall burn <WH6999> the memorial <WH234> of it, part of the beaten <WH1643> corn <WH1643> thereof, and part of the oil <WH8081> thereof, with all <WH3605> the frankincense <WH3828> thereof: it is an offering made by fire to the LORD. <WH3068>
